Atlapedia® Online contains full color physical maps, political maps as well as key facts and statistics on countries of the world.
The **Countries A to Z** section, provides facts, figures and statistical data on geography, climate, people, religion, language, history, economy & more..  The **World Maps** section, provides full color physical maps and political maps for regions of the world.

 The **Resources** section contains additional school or homework resources for Teachers & Students.

Don't forget to Bookmark this page now. Why not tell your teachers and friends about this site too.
